name: Prototype Football
description: This is a football game for 2 players. Score points by moving the ball to opponents goal. Multiply points by kicking the ball to the bouncers that are on corners of the pitch. Player 1 can move with WASD, Kick the ball with SPACE. Player 2 can move with ARROW Keys and kick the ball with right control. If you want to reset the game press "O".
